attributes.action: Present Ann-Marie with a new stapler for Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unfortunately, staff at Ann-Marie's office have refused to purchase a brand new stapler for her desk, insisting that she must use an ancient 1950s version, and offering compensation by means of hole punchers

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
